Necross/ Malice:
 
"*I'll do that.  Just keep your pet away from Splattercannon fo a while.*" Necross said before someone else cut in.
"*Would you please quit yelling through the comm system?  I'm trying to sleep here!*" Malice said with much irritation in his voice.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

"I'm loyal to Unicron and you know..."replied BlackNightmare while 
her bedroom's door automatically closed"I never betray him... I 'll 
pay your advice with other: This stupid bot could be a danger 
without know it and with out willing him. You should watch him 
too!!! "


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Splattercannon/ Necross:
>  
> "What?  Why you twisted little Witch-!" Splattercannon shouted as 
he rushed forward to strangle Blacknightmare.
> "*Splattercannon, hold!  I need your help in the upper Annex.  
Leave the sisters to their own devices.  If they wish to fill their 
time with some pet, let them*" Necross said through the comm system.
> Splattercannon barely restrained himself, and the turned and 
stomped out.
> "*You had better watch yourself.  He isn't bright, but when he is 
worked up, well, you know.  He is just concerned that you might be 
plotting against Unicron or something.  Just leave him be, and you 
should be fine.*" Necross said to Blacknightmare.  
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> "Are you spying me????"said cooly the femme"why it's wrong a 
> innocent kiss? or are you jealous???"
> 
>

> wrote:
> > Splattercannon:
> >  
> > The male forced the door open and stepped in.  He scowled at 
> Blacknightmare.
> > "Testing him by hanging all over him?  It may not be my place to 
> say, but I don't think you should be trying to get involved with 
> him."
> >

> > saying:

> > > > He left after saying goodbye.  He returned to the training 
> room 
> > > and picked up Hellplague.  She was beginning to come around, 
but 
> > not 
> > > awake yet.  He carried her to her room, set her on the bed, 
then 
> > had 
> > > a mental debate.  To stay or go, disobey a Master, or do as 
she 
> > > said.  He reluctantly left, and found an empty oom.  he 
stepped 
> in 
> > > to find a totally bare chamber, except for a computer terminal 
> in 
> > > the wall, wall monitor, and a bed.  He was wore out, and 
flopped 
> > on 
> > > the bed and promtly fell asleep.
> > > >  
> > > > Splattercannon, who had listened and watched part of what 
> > recently 
> > > transpired, walked to Blacknightmare's room and hit the door 
> > tone.  
> > > He didn't know jus what the femmes were up to, but it sure 
> > confused 
> > > Splattercannon.  He wanted o know exactly what was up, so he 
> > didn't 
> > > end up in trouble as usual.

> left 
> > > the

on 
> > her 
> > > > bed.
> > > > > "Before I go, where am I to stay?  With you or 
Hellplague?  
> Or 
> > > in 
> > > > that empty room?" he asked, sitting down by the bed.
